title: Dear Everyone Unable to Climb Out of Low Elo:

replies.body: I feel inspired like never before.
Seeing this post... it feels you with Determination!
Could this be.... AN UNDERTALE QUOTE?
http://i.imgur.com/OTV7ujA.png"
It feels me? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Making cookies right now. Saw this post and realized I must play {{champion:20}} next game.
Seeing this pic fills you with determination

> [{quoted}](name=B for Box,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jtIbtmqV,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-14T18:09:50.372+0000)
>
> Seeing this pic fills you with detemmination

ftfy
wat{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
if you don't know you're not ready yet.
I don't like Undertale, and I think it's yet another stupid youtube sensation game, whatcha gonna do?
I suppose I could try to make some sort of butthurt statement that you would expect, but instead I choose to blame top lane for no mia.

I'm legit though, I never found the appeal to it other than it being famous on youtube. Nobody ever bothered telling me what's so different about it, that makes it better from Slenderman, FNAF, Amnesia, etc etc.

Its really a game for those that enjoy its sense of humor, kind of like earthbound. 

of course this all goes back to what I said to you after you zombie palmed, if you don't already understand why undertale is considered a good game, you aren't ready yet.

Also I'm sure you wanted me to mention that all the game you mentioned were horror games, and I would've earlier, but my support is trash and forgot to ward it.
I heard to part of the OST of this game in Youtube and instantly went to buy it. Dem Feels.

http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.gurl.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2015%2F03%2Fspongebob.gif&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150

only getting back into ranked games when i'm {{champion:86}}-teed the jungle

Not sure if you are being insulting or inspirational. 

https://i.imgflip.com/u5ww1.jpg
I'm unable to climb out of unranked

I love this. Good one and positive at that. ^^ 

I upvote it.
I'm surprised the silver player who said this hasn't filed for copyright considering how big it has become.
FUCKYEA! Got out of b3. 3muchinspiration5me
what counts as low elo
i just lucked out of a nightmare match where 3 people were arguing over top lane while i was in 3rd and final match of my promos. how do you climb over that?
Pay more money to Riot so that one day they might consider tackling the root of toxicity: trolls.
How would you tackle it?

IP bans, on top of my head. So you can't make any more new accounts to keep trolling.


And I wouldn't have let it get such a big fucking issue to beggin with. But hey, they like wanking around their numbers alot, so who am I to take that from them. To be honest, Steam found a great solution to it, Riot can't do jack shit in their one and only game?
Let's be honest, Riot isn't Valve.

Hahahahaha mate, you know what I find extremely hilarious?
Both their Player Support sucks just as hard.
Yeah, but Valve has better programming.
On the miniscule amount of games they've produced themselves, indeed they have.
True.  Really I'm not interested in putting either above the other.  I like league, not dota.
Knowing that someday ranked will be fixed.......... It fills you with determination.
damn that was clever +1
lol
God damn, that was inspiring.  Thanks OP.
But.. But.. But IM THE GROUCH
Wise words from a wise grouch.

I don't know if I can or can't climb ranked, because I haven't ever cared until the upcoming S6 changes.  But now maybe I'll care a bit more since I can actually play with friends

Season 5 I didn't even finish my placements

I think season 6 is gonna be fun, but I don't think ranked is going to matter as much any more. If you have the right friends list you should be able to get gold/plat as the same skill as what used to be a bronze player. Then again, maybe I'm just salty bc all of my irl friends who are good at video games don't like league at all so I'm not getting a free plat border next season for sure :(
I can't climb out of overused memes.
